Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you based on your needs and preferences. Considering its exceptional quality and value, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best possible deal while maximizing the benefits of our product. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information to make an informed decision. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
